subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: What did the good old days of pitching the Preakness look like? A radio ditty from around 1968, “The Preakness Song,” gives a clue.
snippet: What did the good old days of pitching the Preakness look like? A radio ditty from around 1968, “The Preakness Song,” gives a clue.
